text: Ty51-37 steam train plinthed at the station. Rzepin railway station is a railway station serving the town of Rzepin, in the Lubusz Voivodeship, Poland. The station is located on the Warsaw–Kunowice railway, Wrocław–Szczecin railway and Wierzbno–Rzepin railway. The train services are operated by PKP and Przewozy Regionalne. ==Train services== The station is served by the following service(s): *EuroCity services (EC) Berlin - Frankfurt (Oder) - Rzepin - Poznan - Kutno - Warsaw *EuroCity services (EC) Berlin - Frankfurt (Oder) - Rzepin - Poznan - Bydgoszcz - Gdansk - Gdynia *EuroNight services (EN) Paris - Strasbourg - Berlin - Frankfurt (Oder) - Poznan - Warsaw - Brest - Minsk - Moscow *EuroNight services (EN) Cologne - Duisburg - Dortmund - Berlin - Frankfurt (Oder) - Poznan - Kutno - Warsaw *Intercity services Swinoujscie - Szczecin - Kostrzyn - Rzepin - Zielona Gora - Wroclaw *Regional services (R) Rzepin - Swiebodzin - Zbasynek *Regional services (R) Berlin - Frankfurt (Oder) - Rzepin - Zielona Gora *Regional services (R) Szczecin - Kostrzyn - Rzepin - Zielona Gora == External links == == References == * This article is based upon a translation of the Polish language version as of July 2016. Category:Railway stations in Lubusz Voivodeship Category:Człuchów County
title: Rzepin railway station
